alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 9:18PM MDT until June 24 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jones County in central South Dakota... South central Stanley County in central South Dakota... Northwestern Lyman County in central South Dakota... * Until 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/. * At 1017 PM CDT/917 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Van Metre, or 13 miles north of Murdo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wendte around 930 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
